# Regen Studio

> Regenerative innovation design studio helping organizations create systemic
> positive impact at the intersection of technology, society, and nature.
> Based in The Netherlands and Brazil.

## What We Do
- Digital Product Passport advisory (independent, vendor-neutral)
- Innovation design services (10 methodologies for complex multi-stakeholder environments)
- Vision & strategy for regenerative systems
- Visual storytelling for systemic innovation
- Energy transition & community energy design
- Circular economy & business model design

## Focus Areas
- Circular Economy: DPP compliance, circular business models, ESPR advisory
- Energy Transition: Smart grids, energy communities, energy justice
- Liveable Cities: Living labs, digital participation, urban greening
- Resilient Nature: Bioacoustics, reforestation, biodiversity monitoring
- Digital Society: Digital identity, privacy-by-design, AI governance

## Key Regulations We Advise On
- ESPR (Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation)
- EU Battery Regulation 2023/1542 — DPP mandatory from Feb 2027
- Construction Products Regulation 2024/3110 — 37 product families
- Toy Safety Regulation 2025/2509
- Packaging & Packaging Waste Regulation 2025/40
- Textiles delegated act (in preparation)

## Interactive Demos
- [CPR DPP Tracker](https://demos.regenstudio.space): Track all 37 CPR product families and harmonised standards progress
- [Battery Passport Checker](https://demos.regenstudio.space): Free 1-minute tool to assess DPP obligations under EU Battery Regulation
- [DPP System](https://demos.regenstudio.space): Full product passport platform prototype (restricted, request access)
- [EDI Wallet](https://demos.regenstudio.space): European Digital Identity wallet prototype with selective disclosure (restricted, request access)
- [AI Tax → UBI](https://demos.regenstudio.space): Policy simulation exploring AI taxation and universal basic income

## Locations
- The Netherlands: Regen Studio B.V., Berg en Dal (KVK 90337948)
- Brazil: Regen Studio Consultoria LTDA, São Paulo (CNPJ 57.579.114/0001-55)

## Pages
- [Home](https://www.regenstudio.space): Vision, focus areas, services overview, and client types
- [Digital Product Passports](https://www.regenstudio.space/digital-product-passports/): DPP advisory services, readiness assessments, compliance roadmaps
- [Innovation Services](https://www.regenstudio.space/innovation-services.html): 10 innovation design methodologies for complex multi-stakeholder environments
- [Blog](https://www.regenstudio.space/blog.html): Analysis of EU regulations, project case studies, and innovation insights
- [FAQ](https://www.regenstudio.space/faq.html): 47 questions covering DPPs, EU regulations, energy transition, circular economy, and more
- [About](https://www.regenstudio.space/about.html): Team, philosophy, and company background
- [Digital Identities](https://www.regenstudio.space/digital-identities/): Self-sovereign identity and eIDAS 2.0 advisory
- [Client Projects](https://www.regenstudio.space/client-projects.html): Selected project portfolio
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.regenstudio.space/privacy.html): Zero cookies, self-hosted assets, GDPR/LGPD compliant
- [Interactive Demos](https://demos.regenstudio.space): Five demo tools for DPP, digital identity, and policy simulation
